tool.name: integron_finder
tool.version:
integron_finder version 1.5.1rc3 Python 2.7.9 (default, Jun 29 2016, 13:08:31) [GCC 4.9.2]
- open-source GPLv3, - Jean Cury, Bertrand Neron, Eduardo Rocha, - citation:
Identification and analysis of integrons and cassette arrays in bacterial genomes Jean Cury; Thomas Jove; Marie Touchon; Bertrand Neron; Eduardo PC Rocha Nucleic Acids Research 2016; doi: 10.1093/nar/gkw319
tool.description: A tool to detect Integron in DNA sequences.
tool.command:
integron_finder #if $positional_1 and $positional_1 is not None: $positional_1 #end if $local_max $func_annot
#if $cpu and $cpu is not None: --cpu $cpu #end if
#if $distance_thresh and $distance_thresh is not None: --distance_thresh $distance_thresh #end if
#if $outdir and $outdir is not None: --outdir $outdir #end if $linear $union_integrases
#if $cmsearch and $cmsearch is not None: --cmsearch $cmsearch #end if
#if $hmmsearch and $hmmsearch is not None: --hmmsearch $hmmsearch #end if
#if $prodigal and $prodigal is not None: --prodigal $prodigal #end if
#if $path_func_annot and $path_func_annot is not None: --path_func_annot $path_func_annot #end if $gembase
#if $attc_model and $attc_model is not None: --attc_model $attc_model #end if
#if $evalue_attc and $evalue_attc is not None: --evalue_attc $evalue_attc #end if $keep_palindromes $no_proteins
#if $max_attc_size and $max_attc_size is not None: --max_attc_size $max_attc_size #end if
#if $min_attc_size and $min_attc_size is not None: --min_attc_size $min_attc_size #end if $eagle_eyes > $default

param.label: Path to the replicon file (in fasta format), eg : path/to/file.fst or file.fst
param.name: positional_1

param.label: Allows thorough local detection (slower but more sensitive and do not increase false positive rate).
param.name: local_max

param.label: Functional annotation of CDS associated with integrons HMM files are needed in Func_annot folder.
param.name: func_annot

param.label: Number of CPUs used by INFERNAL and HMMER
param.name: cpu

param.label: Two elements are aggregated if they are distant of DISTANCE_THRESH [4kb] or less
param.name: distance_thresh

param.label: Set the output directory (default: current)
param.name: outdir

param.label: Consider replicon as linear. If replicon smaller than 20kb, it will be considered as linear
param.name: linear

param.label: Instead of taking intersection of hits from Phage_int profile (Tyr recombinases) and integron_integrase profile, use the union of the hits
param.name: union_integrases

param.label: Complete path to cmsearch if not in PATH. eg: /usr/local/bin/cmsearch
param.name: cmsearch

param.label: Complete path to hmmsearch if not in PATH. eg: /usr/local/bin/hmmsearch
param.name: hmmsearch

param.label: Complete path to prodigal if not in PATH. eg: /usr/local/bin/prodigal
param.name: prodigal

param.label: Path to file containing all hmm bank paths (one per line)
param.name: path_func_annot

param.label: Use gembase formatted protein file instead of Prodigal. Folder structure must be preserved
param.name: gembase

param.label: path or file to the attc model (Covariance Matrix)
param.name: attc_model

param.label: set evalue threshold to filter out hits above it (default: 1)
param.name: evalue_attc

param.label: for a given hit, if the palindromic version is found, don't remove the one with highest evalue
param.name: keep_palindromes

param.label: Don't annotate CDS and don't find integrase, just look for attC sites.
param.name: no_proteins

param.label: set maximum value fot the attC size (default: 200bp)
param.name: max_attc_size

param.label: set minimum value fot the attC size (default: 40bp)
param.name: min_attc_size

param.label: Synonym of --local_max. Like a soaring eagle in the sky, catching rabbits(or attC sites) by surprise.
param.name: eagle_eyes

param.label: DNA sequence (raw)
param.name: INPUT1

tool.help:
What it is ? ============
A tool to detect Integron in DNA sequences
External links: ===============
- Tool homepage_ - bio.tools_ entry
.. _homepage: https://github.com/gem-pasteur/Integron_Finder .. _bio.tools: https://bio.tools/tool/integron_finder
